original_text: And the king and Jehoiada gave it to such as did the work of the service of the house of the Lord, and hired masons and carpenters to repair the house of the Lord, and also such as wrought iron and brass to mend the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 왕과 여호야다가 그 돈을 여호와의 전 감독자에게 주어 석수와 목수를 고용하여 여호와의 전을 보수하며 또 철공과 놋쇠공을 고용하여 여호와의 전을 수리하게 하였더니

sentences.original_text: And the king and Jehoiada gave it
to such as did the work of service
of the house of the Lord
to repair the house of the Lord
and also such as wrought iron and brass
sentences.korean_translation: 또 철과 놋을 다루는 자들도 고용하여

sentences.original_text: to mend the house of the Lord
